title: Verona, Modena fonts
content:
HI, i'm searching for [www.three.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20130803211657/http:/www.three.co.uk/ "www.three.co.uk") - Verona, Modena font, where can i find?  
thank you
author: jinkazama

comments.content:
For what I know, These are exclusive corporate typefaces, designed by fellow Typophile [Miles Newlyn](http://web.archive.org/web/20130803211657/http:/www.newlyn.com/), and as such not available.

Dav

hi... i have the modena font from three.co.uk..[edited by moderator]... regards... sanjiv.

[Moderator's comment: We do not support or condone the sharing of fonts. Please refrain from passing information around.]
